item.title: Use xAPI to Correlate Training to Tangible Business Impact
item.description:
Does your sales team know your product inside out?

Can they upsell while anticipating the customer’s needs?

Is your delivery team up to date with the latest developments in technologies they work with?

Read the Article Here

item.title: 4 killer examples of xAPI used for more effective learning
item.description:
xAPI is a game changer. It can help you to identify where learning interventions might be needed; measure the impact of blended learning experiences; and identify how they could be improved. In this blog we take a closer look at what xAPI is and share some real-world examples of xAPI in action.

Read the Article Here.
